alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Mason; Wood (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 8:28AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Gusty showers will impact portions of Meigs, Gallia, Washington, southeastern Jackson, Morgan, southeastern Vinton, Athens, central Lawrence, Mason, northwestern Jackson and western Wood Counties through 930 AM EST... At 827 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from 10 miles north of McConnelsville to near Lake Vesuvius. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Parkersburg, Athens, Marietta, Belpre, Point Pleasant, Gallipolis, Pomeroy, Glouster, McConnelsville, Beverly, Rio Grande, Albany, Racine, Coolville, Rutland, Chesterhill, Lake Vesuvius, Forked Run State Park, Vienna and Ravenswood. This includes the following highways... Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 143 and 152, and between mile markers 168 and 186. Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 1 and 17. Route 50 in West Virginia between mile markers 1 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
